title: The Kai Cenat Interview: The Bronx, Teanna Trump, NLE Choppa Song & More
description:
Kai Cenat talks about his come up, relationships with Kyrie Irving, Teanna Trump, NLE Choppa, being focused on work, making content, saving money, no time for girls, and more! https://www.instagram.com/kaicenat/ ----- 00:00 Intro 6:01 Choppa did the song outta love, Kai didn't pay for the feature 7:40 Relationship with Teanna Trump, Adin Ross linked them together, Adam says she's flaky 8:46 Teanna doesn't realize how huge she is, super humble, she could be making way more bred 17:09 Aba and Preach tried to cancel Kai for his stealing money from a tip jar skit, Kai says he understands in retrospect 24:17 Rappers are more thirsty now to collab with streamers, Adin helped make it cool 27:34 Girls ignoring you until you get poppin 34:40 Who is the most famous girl that slid in his DM 36:20 Kai was asked to be in a fake relationship for clout, he's not gonna say who 39:30 Fake dreads for prom, a lot of people wear hair extensions, not a big deal 50:56 A girl made a Tiktok talkin' bout "I would neverrr talk to Kai Cenat" his fans came for her, and she reached out to Kai crying to stop the hate she was getting 52:37 Kai explains "Rizz" and how Tiktok remixed it and took it from him 1:01:39 Kai would never do content with 6ix9ine 1:13:15 Working with Kyrie Irving 1:17:12 Kai says AMP will never break up the way Team 10 did 1:27:50 Kai wants to be an actor ----- Shout to our Partners at Gamer Supps! Follow us on Social Media: https://www.snapchat.com/discover/No_... http://www.twitter.com/nojumper http://www.instagram.com/nojumper https://www.facebook.com/NOJUMPEROFFI... http://www.reddit.com/r/nojumper JOIN THE DISCORD: https://discord.gg/Q3XPfBm Follow Adam22: https://www.tiktok.com/@adam22 http://www.twitter.com/adam22 http://www.instagram.com/adam22 adam22hoe on Snapchat
